# Awesome Flavours of Databases Structured or Relational, Un Structured, In Memory

## Structued or Relational Databases

* [MySQL](https://www.mysql.com/)
* [Postgresql](https://www.postgresql.org/)
* [SQLite](https://sqlite.org/index.html)

## NOSQL Databases

* [MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/)
  
## In Memory Key Value Store

* [Redis](https://redis.io/)

## Graph Databases

* [Neo4j is a native graph database platform](https://neo4j.com/)
